moods.Bad: Take a deep breath. Consider journaling your thoughts or reaching out to your partner.
moods.Tired: Rest up! Share your workload and talk to your partner for support.
moods.Okay: You're doing fine! How about planning a small surprise for your partner?
moods.Happy: Spread your happiness! Share this moment with your loved one.
moods.Excited: Channel your excitement into planning a fun activity with your partner!
